title: Who is X Factor: Celebrity contestant Jenny Ryan aka The Vixen from The Chase?
text:
Will Simon Cowell lure Jenny Ryan away from The Chase with a record deal? (Picture: ITV/Rex)

The X Factor: Celebrity kicks off on ITV tonight as judges Simon Cowell, Nicole Scherzinger and Louis Walsh seek to find a new singing star from a selection of fellow famous faces.

One of the familiar names competing on the new format of the TV talent show is none other than fiery quiz aficionado Jenny Ryan who is better known as The Vixen on ITV show The Chase.

But who is Jenny ‘The Vixen’ Ryan and how will she fare in the competition?

Who is Jenny ‘The Vixen’ Ryan from The Chase?

Joining Anne Hegerty, Shaun Wallace, Paul Sinha and Mark Labbett on the show in 2015, Jenny Ryan became known as The Vixen and was a cut-throat opposition for many of the competitors that faced her.

Formerly known as the ‘Bolton Braniac’ because of where she grew up in Greater Manchester, the quiz expert describes her job on The Chase as being a: ‘Professional Crusher of Dreams.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘The Vixen is the boss…she’s probably going to eat you alive,’ Jenny quipped.

Jenny Ryan AKA The Vixen in character on The Chase (Picture: ITV)

Jenny, 37, got her place on The Chase after Anne Hegerty (aka The Governess) approached her about becoming a new Chaser when they competed in the same quiz league team together.

‘There was a six month recruitment process, I was in the running with a few others and we were assessed to see who, if any, would be a fit. It’s a big brand and the fans are mega-fans so if they put the wrong person in the hot-seat then there would be outrage,’ Jenny told Metro.co.uk.

Revealing where she got her nickname ‘The Vixen’ from Jenny said: ‘The name (The Vixen) was picked with a couple of things in mind. Firstly, because I have long red hair which is put into a ponytail so it’s like a fox’s brush and secondly because I’ve always had a love of animals too and this one gives me free reign to be a bit predatory and a bit flirty so it allows me to be a bit wild if I need to be.’

Jenny’s costume on The Chase is a nod to her character’s name (Picture: ITV Studios)

Jenny’s incredible general knowledge comes from her love of books and reading, which was nurtured by her parents from an early age.

Prior to appearing on The Chase she studied at the University of Leeds and appeared in a number of quiz shows as a contestant, including Fifteen to One and The Weakest Link.

Advertisement

Advertisement

In her spare time, Jenny says that she likes to play computer games and she is also in a band called Nanukes of the North, in which she plays the ukulele and sings.

‘We rehearse a couple of times a week,’ Jenny revealed. ‘We do covers of pop and rock songs and some new age and punk stuff and its really good fun. It’s a good outlet!’

Jenny ‘The Vixen’ Ryan on The X Factor: Celebrity

In July 2019, it was announced that Jenny had got a spot as one of the famous singing hopefuls on the brand new ITV series X Factor: Celebrity judged by Simon, Nicole and Louis.

‘When I got a call about Celebrity X factor I thought wow, what an opportunity,’ Jenny said.

‘It felt like everything had been leaning towards that point.’

Jenny stuns with her performance on X Factor: Celebrity tonight (Picture: ITV)

Revealing in the first episode that she’s excited to: ‘see what Simon thinks’ of her singing talent, the Bolton-born quiz expert has been having training with a vocal coach ahead of appearing on the show and is set to stun the judges with her first performance.

description: One of the familiar names competing on X Factor Celebrity is quiz expert Jenny Ryan who is better known as The Vixen on ITV show The Chase.
